dcterms:description: The HMC-QU dataset includes 2D echocardiography recordings for myocardial infarction (MI) detection, consisting of 260 recordings from A2C and A4C views of 130 subjects, with labels indicating the presence or absence of RWMA.
dcterms:title: HMC-QU Dataset
